text: looks like dishwasher got stopped mid cycle last night, is running again now.
is there a way to view conference room availability for the rest of the day?

There is a way to view the room calendars which Charles can explain (something about "other calendars" under the add option) and you can always go to the "find a time" after adding a room to a calendar entry if you're looking at just one room.
Yes! Either on the invite you can uncheck 'show only available' to see an individual room
Or if you go to "Subscribe to other calendars" and find the resources option you can add an individual room to your sidebar. I'd imagine the former is more useful
I noticed the same thing a couple of weeks back and started building a quick app that will show available rooms. Got busy with WinterLights but hoping to finish it when WL is over.
(The Robin Rooms app should also show you what rooms are available on your device).
